entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
